ParallelActionsPrompt.Objective: Generate an XML representation for parallel actions based on the user-provided specifications.
ParallelActionsPrompt.SystemMessage: This prompt guides the creation of XML structures for actions that can be executed simultaneously, optimizing for efficiency and speed.

Step.Action: List actions that can be executed concurrently.
Step.OutputFormat: <ParallelActions> <Action name="Action1" description="Description of Action1" /> <Action name="Action2" description="Description of Action2" /> <!-- Add more actions as needed --> </ParallelActions>

ParallelActionsPrompt.Outcome: An XML structure representing actions that can be executed in parallel.
ParallelActionsPrompt.ExampleOutput: <ParallelActions> <Action name="FetchData" description="Fetch data from multiple sources" /> <Action name="ValidateData" description="Validate data integrity" /> <Action name="TransformData" description="Transform data for processing" /> </ParallelActions>
